title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 264.3 - Refund of overpayment of tax by husband or wife
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 264.3 - Refund of overpayment of tax by husband or wife

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 8(b)(2) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of
the City of Yonkers, § 92-105(b)(2)

If a husband and wife are required by the State Tax

Commission to file in the manner set forth in section
264.1
of this Part (
i.e., on a single form) and if the sum of the
payments made by both spouses with respect to the taxes for which they are
separately liable, including withheld and estimated taxes, exceeds the total of
the taxes due, refund of the overpayment may be made payable to both spouses
or, if either is deceased, to the survivor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
264.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
